1.0.name: wordpress/monetizer101-shop-menu-widget
1.0.description:
Monetizer101 is a great free solution to start generating further income from your website.

Monetizer101 gives you a fully managed store to your site, offering great deals and discounts available up to 95% from the world's biggest online brands to your customers, whilst giving you a huge revenue share of up to 70% in return. We offer over 2,000,000 products from 200 brands in 25 product categories  all with discounts available up to 95%.

So why not sign up today and start earning money tomorrow? Sign Up for Free! 

It takes only a few seconds and you will immediately get your Shop online! And once your Shop has been published then make it live! Add a top level "Shop" tab to your Website's main Menu to drive traffic to your shop using our Monetizer101 Shop - Menu Widget.

The Monetizer101 Shop - Menu Widget plugin will add a top level "Shop" tab to your Website's main Menu
